item.caption: File size
item.comment: Maximum available size of file for uploading (in megabytes).

item.caption: Admin play list
item.comment: Enable admin play list, where users can take MP3s to add them to their private play lists.

item.caption: Reporting
item.comment: Enable reporting feature, that user could report bad MP3s to administrator.

item.caption: Autoplay
item.comment: Enable autoplay that MP3 player start up.

item.caption: Use Audio Bitrate (kbs)
item.comment: Custom bittrate is used only while converting non-mp3 files to mp3
